      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Method to obtain name of the player.
        Returns:
        The name of the player.

      • getHandSize

        public int getHandSize()
        Method to obtain the size of the List "hand".
        Returns:
        The number of Dominos in the player's hand

      • getDomino

        public Domino getDomino(int n)
        Method to obtain a certain Domino from the hand of the player.
        Parameters:
        n - Index number that refers to the wanted Domino in the player's hand.
        Returns:
        The Domino in the player's hand, which index is input.

        Method to add a given Domino to the player's hand.

      • removeDomino

        public void removeDomino(int n)
        Method to remove a Domino from the player's hand, using an index number.
        Parameters:
        n - Index number that refers to the wanted Domino in the player's hand.

      • removeDomino

        public void removeDomino(Domino d)
        Method to remove a Domino from the player's hand, using the Domino the caller want to remove.
        Parameters:
        d - Domino that is to be removed from the player's hand.

      • noMoreDominos

        public boolean noMoreDominos()
        Method to determine if the last Domino chip has been played.
        Returns:
        true if the player's hand has no Dominos left, otherwise false.

      • searchDomino

        public boolean searchDomino(int left,
                   int right)
        Method that searches the player's hand, to determine if a given Domino is in the player's hand.
        Parameters:
        left - Left value of the Domino that is being searched.
        right - Right value of the Domino being searched.
        Returns:
        true if the Domino given in the input is in the player's hand, otherwise false.

      • searchForDouble

        public int searchForDouble(int i)
        Method that searches the player's hand, to determine if a given Domino, that has double value, is in the player's hand.
        Parameters:
        i - Value of the Domino being searched.
        Returns:
        If it is found, returns the index number "n" in the player's hand, of the Domino being searched, otherwise -1.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Method to obtain the String representation of a player's hand.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String representation of the player's hand.
